content: Good day all. I am working for a company where we transport ERP data tables to and from a CRM system. I had a consultant ask me if I am HL7 certified. I am trying to understand if it is something that I should be looking at for the company.

I'm no expert but I guess it would be useful to ask the consultant specifically they're looking for because there are a broad range of certifications! http://www.hl7.org/certification/#:~:text=HL7%20Certification,information%20technology%20(HIT)%20standards.
